import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { getAuth, deleteUser } from "firebase/auth"; import ClickAwayListener from "react-click-away-listener"; const Account = ({ setUser, setIsLogged }) => { const [modalOpen, setModalOpen] = useState(); const modalToggle = () => { setModalOpen(!modalOpen); }; let history = useHistory(); const deleteAcc = () => { const auth = getAuth(); const currentUser = auth.currentUser; deleteUser(currentUser) .then(() => { setUser(""); setIsLogged(false); history.push("/"); }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); setModalOpen(!modalOpen); }; return ( <>
